title: your state
body: how can you change your state from eu west to north america?

replies.body: Personally my favorite state is Asia

If by state you mean your account, it's possible to use an Account Transfer to move from EUW to NA with Riot Points.  More informaiton oon how that works can be found through our [Transfer FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ).  Let me know if you have any questions!
